data.summary: Short-term (30d) technicals show mild bearish pressure: BTC is trading below its 20- and 50-day SMAs with RSI in neutral territory and a negative MACD histogram. Market microstructure indicates a recent high ~$124k and a short-term low around $110k. News flow (CoinDesk + aggregated) is mixed-to-slightly-positive while the Fear & Greed Index is neutral (48). Overall: cautious/neutral short-term outlook with downside risk if $110k breaks, and upside capped by the SMA zone ~$115.8k–$116.7k unless momentum and macro catalysts push price above $124k.
key_factors: Price below SMA20 and SMA50 → short-term technical weakness
RSI ~46 → not oversold/overbought — room to move either way
Negative MACD histogram → momentum currently favors sellers
Recent 30d high ≈ $124k and low ≈ $110k define current range
Fear & Greed Index neutral (48) → balanced retail sentiment
News flow mixed with a tilt to positive (Tether RGB, macro optimism)
